item.title: Giraffe
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: :star: SIZE: 16.5‚Äù / 42 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. giraffe pattern MATERIALS: Worsted weight yarn in yellow, beige, brown, pink (leftover) and black (leftover) Size G-6 / 4 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (12 mm) Yarn needle Pins Fiberfill for stuffing leg (make 4, start in brown yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Rnd 2: inc in all 6 st [12]
